main: ^It is an annual historical celebration that takes place every year in Tagbilaran City in the island province of Bohol in the Philippines every July.

c-0: ^The Blood Compact or Sandugo occurred on March 1565 when a Spanish navigator named Legaspi and the local Datu did a ritual of them both shedding blood (“dugo” in the Visayan dialect) into a cup and then drinking the contents thereof.
^This festival commemorates the Treaty of Friendship between a Datu in Bohol, and Spanish Miguel López de Legazpi.
